jisiyi.Shapes

类 Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • jisiyi.Shapes.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Rectangle()
      sets the width and height cordinates of rectangle to defualt 0
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      sets specific values to the rectangle object

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      double centerX()
      determines where the center point of a rectangle is
      double centerY()
      determines where the center point of a rectangle is
      boolean checkSquare()
      checks if this rectangle is a square
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
      draws the rectangle
      double getArea()
      returns the area of the circle
      double getPerimeter()
      returns the perimeter of the rectangle
      boolean isPointInside(double x, double y)
      checks if a point is inside a rectangle

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()
        sets the width and height cordinates of rectangle to defualt 0

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height)
        sets specific values to the rectangle object
        参数:
        x - is the x cordinate of the top left point of the rectangle
        y - is the y cordinate of the top left point of the rectangle
        width - is the length in the x direction of the rectangle
        height - is the length in the y direction of the rectangle

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPerimeter

        public double getPerimeter()
        returns the perimeter of the rectangle
        返回:
        returns the perimeter using the formula (width+height) * 2

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        returns the area of the circle
        返回:
        returns the area using the width*height fomula

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        checks if a point is inside a rectangle
        参数:
        x - is the x cordinate of the point the user wants to check
        y - is the y cordinate of the point the user wants to check
        返回:
        a boolean checking if the x and y value is in between the rectangle boundaries

      • checkSquare

        public boolean checkSquare()
        checks if this rectangle is a square
        返回:
        a boolean if the width and height of the rectangle is the same

      • centerX

        public double centerX()
        determines where the center point of a rectangle is
        返回:
        a x value of the center point by halfing the width

      • centerY

        public double centerY()
        determines where the center point of a rectangle is
        返回:
        a y cordinate of the center point by halfing the height

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        draws the rectangle
        参数:
        marker - a PApplet
